sentences.english: Nan Zhao Zheng usurp Montessori, changing the country's largest long and Hao Yue.
sentences.chinese: 南诏郑氏篡蒙氏，改国号曰大长和。

sentences.english: Although the country is the same one, but it is two dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是同一个国号，却是两个朝代。

sentences.english: As a sense of national identity grew so did the use of national names.
sentences.chinese: 民族认同感如斯滋长，久而久之必然可以称呼为国号。
